title: What after Diane Spinner’s Insider Sale of Bancorp of New Jersey Inc (NYSEMKT:BKJ) Stock?
content:
Diane Spinner Insider Sell Transaction  
In a legal document that was filled with the Washington-based Security and Exchange Commission, it was revealed that the director of Bancorp of New Jersey Inc (NYSEMKT:BKJ) 11.40 +0.15 1.33% Diane Spinner, an insider in bear’s eye, made a sale for 3,647 shares of the public company, having an approx. value of $41,029 U.S. Dollars using an average stock price per share of $11.3 U.S. Dollars. Diane Spinner now has in hand 63,420 shares of Bancorp Of New Jersey Inc. 
 Bancorp Of New Jersey Inc Stock Rating, Sentiment and Fundamentals  
In accordance with our well-know time momentum model as illustrated on the chart below and the fact that Diane Spinner, who can be considered as someone in the know, has unaloded such a substantial amount we rate this stock “SELL”. The stock price of Bancorp Of New Jersey Inc has lost 2.00% compared to the price last 125 days. And this smooth down trend looks set to continue.

The firm has 71 employees. At the moment its market worth is: $71.14 million and it has 6.32 million outstanding shares. Currently there are 1.16% shareholders and the institutional ownership stands at 1.16%. Bancorp Of New Jersey Inc was founded in New Jersey on 2006-11-01. The stock closed at $11.25 yesterday and it had average 2 days volume of 11249 shares. It is up from the 30 days average shares volume of 3880. Bancorp Of New Jersey Inc has a 52w low of $10.30 and a 250 days high of $12.80. The stock price is above the 200 days simple moving average.
